title: Alright, alright. Will someone PLEASE explain to me the whole OCE Skin situation?
body: And TL;DR it for me if you'd be so kind.

replies.body:
I will try to summarise the timeline here.

1. There was only NA for OCE players.
2. Riot announced OCE around mid 2013, with promised goodies (such as OCE skin) and free transfer.
3. OCE became a thing.
4. People mass transferred to OCE for free, but there was no OCE skin, instead everyone got a free Pool Party Ziggs and the champ if you don't have them already.
5. People ask/cry/demand for the OCE skin but no response, after a while of angry and joke posts, it was assumed that OCE skin was no more.
6. Ocean Week came and re-ignited the hopes for OCE skins, but the event apparently didn't feature such things so the hope soon died out.
7. Then out of no where, just yesterday, Riot finally announced the arrival of OCE skins. It would come with half price instead of free.
8. People then hop on the forum asking for it to be free.

Honesty, I think there is a reason to why they're asking for half price, considering there is a high possibility that the team was in fact, doing this while having the budget/capital pulled out due to their unsuccessful launch during the OCE server establishment. 

Not to mention, it's like having a delivery man who's 2 years late due to many complications, and instead of maybe praising him for keeping the promise and letting it go, you push him down and beat him up because he has the audacity to ask for 5 dollars for the package.

Sure what's free should be free, but who else was actually expecting its arrival before yesterday? Idk about you but this imo is just too overboard. 

Firstly, OCE is not a big region, so it's understandable that we do not get more than 1 or 2 free goodies. Secondly, we already got free stuff, being the Pool Party Ziggs (and the champ if you didn't own him), and Ocean Week. Then half price on this OCE skin. So is it such a bad thing that requires an outcry? I think the whatever team's dedication on delivering the skin requires more attention than people asking it to be free. 

But it's just me.

>Not to mention, it's like having a delivery man who's 2 years late due to many complications, and instead of maybe praising him for keeping the promise and letting it go, you push him down and beat him up because he has the audacity to ask for 5 dollars for the package.

Are you kidding me?

If a delivery man was 2 years late with a package and expects you to pay that is ridiculous.

Hell a lot of places will give you refunds if your shit is taking to long.

Fact is all things considered this skin is pretty meh for something that is meant to represent our region, and they expect us to pay for it.

I mean realistically it represent the cultures that believe in shit defined by the stars or similar, this isn't just OCE, but several cultures around the world.

It's honestly kinda pathetic.

Not to mention, Riot is giving this half price for us to charity to try and ease the backlash they know they were gonna get for this.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aAQsNNj3,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-09-30T08:12:21.914+0000)
>
> Are you kidding me?
> 
> If a delivery man was 2 years late with a package and expects you to pay that is ridiculous.
> 
> Hell a lot of places will give you refunds if your shit is taking to long.

I think this is one of those cases I would personally ignore the time they took.

Because well, if a package is 2 weeks late, that's BS and we ask for a refund. But if a package is 2 years late, and still somehow get delivered in the end, I view that as admirable, and I really don't mind giving the man some tips for it.

Then again, just as I stated in my post, this is what I personally think about this particular case.

Well, we obviously have different opinions. Like, I agree 2 weeks late is a little BS, but 2 years late? That's just pathetic, especially if they still expect you to pay for it. If it takes 2 years to deliver a package then the people in charge seriously need to review all the systems and people involved.

I was, actually. I still trusted Riot until yesterdays announcement.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aAQsNNj3,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-30T07:39:19.959+0000)
>
> I was, actually. I still trusted Riot until yesterdays announcement.

You're a very dedicated man. I like many others, gave up on it ages ago.
Simple, Riot is charging us money for something that should be free, the whole charity thing is stupid when people would just donate to it without the skin.

They're basically using the charity situation as a cover for having to pay.. Like "you have to pay... but for the first two weeks its DISCOUNTED and proceeds go to charity so it's ok!!!!!!!"

EDIT: I'm all for donating to charity but lmao I'd rather pay the full price and have to go to charity rather than have a discounted price.

I disagree donating to charity is a waste of money look at censer last year over 400 mil got spent on it were is my cure and that's only last year I bet they have it in some lab somewhere have to milk that money before I get it
they are basically saying that you got the ziggs skin free that's it I never got it so give me this one free
Same it's unfair but will Riot do anything? no....

Basically, Riot has made it look like we were getting the skin for free (not once have they ever corrected anyone while people were discussing the "free oceanic skin" on the boards/forums) and then turned around and said that was lying around when the beta was on is our only free skin, despite the fact they've made multiple server skins for other servers and given them free.

TLDR It's a big "f*ck OCE" from Riot.

TL:DR:

Very simple, 
we get cosmic reaper kassadin as our server skin.
it will be discounted 50% for a while and all profits go to charity.

that is all that needs to be known.
So is it half price straight away as soon as it gets released in 5.20?
